name: SmackTalk! Live
description:
Instructions:

Type the text shown for each part of the promo. Take as much time as you need and then press the "Talk Smack!" button. For each segment of the promo, half-credit is given for capitalization mistakes, and no credit is given if there are any other mistakes. If you get enough credit, more than half of the credits possible, after finishing the promo, you will get a good ending for the promo, and otherwise you will get worse endings. Finish all 4 promos to go to the credits and complete the game!

Credits:

The Shockmaster at WCW Clash of the Champions XXIV (August 18, 1993)


Stone Cold Steve Austin at the King of the Ring IV (June 23, 1996)


Scott Steiner on TNA Impact! (May 1, 2008)


Daniel Bryan on RAW - Miz TV (August 12, 2013)


Crowd Sounds: https://freesound.org/

Created at the Tech Valley Game Space: https://techvalleygamespace.com/

Created during Ludum Dare 41 (April 20-23, 2018) https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41

By Alana S. O'Hair - forlorn79@yahoo.com

Tag Team with Anthony Rossello!
